alert.note: Alert for Washington (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 9:55PM EDT until May 09 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Ohio, including the following county, Washington. * WHEN...Until 100 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Little Muskingum River and it`s tributaries is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 953 PM EDT, gauge reports indicate that flooding of the Little Muskingum River and it`s tributaries is occurring, although water levels are falling. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Northeastern Washington County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
